program.name: Door2Door Transportation (SCM)
program.description_short: On-demand transportation for Cambridge seniors and people with mobility impairments
program.description:
Door2Door Transportation provides on-demand rides to medical appointments and grocery stores for eligible Cambridge residents.

To qualify, you must:
- Be a Cambridge resident
- Be age 60 or older, OR have a mobility impairment

Door2Door is also piloting a weekly shuttle service to Target on Somerville Ave. in Somerville.

Note: Service capacity may be limited. Reservations are required.
program.apply_button_description: Call Door2Door by SCM to schedule/register
program.website_description: On-demand transportation for eligible older adults and people with mobility impairments

warning_message.message: Service capacity may be limited. Reservations are required. Trip purposes may be limited to medical appointments and grocery shopping.

documents.text: Proof of Cambridge residency (lease, utility bill)
Proof of age (60+) or documentation of mobility impairment
